title: Accent on adventure
brief_description: Outdoor sports for boy scouts have been and continue to be a basic part of scouting. They require both nerve and skill. This is a report on some of them; including boating, potholing, rock climbing, hill walking, riding, skiing and motor cycling. A film depicting British scouting activities at their best.
